content:
Natalie is an expert archer. The following table shows her scores (points) based on the number of targets she hit.


|  | ||
- | :-: | :-:| :-:| :-:
Targets hit | $1$| $2$| $5$  
Points | $3$ | $6$ | $15$ 

**Plot the ordered pairs from the table.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
